page.title: 04HISTORY OF CAPEL SCHOOL
page.content: { THE PRESENT SCHOOL WAS BUILT IN 1875 WHEN CAPEL NATIONAL SCHOOL, WHICH WAS NEAR CAPEL CHURCH, WAS CLOSED.{CAPEL {BOARD SCHOOL}WAS A FINE BRICK BUILDING WITH A STEEP GABLED ROOF AND GRACEFUL BELL SPIRE. THE SCHOOL HOUSE WAS A CENTRAL FEATURE. IT WAS UNUSUALLY SITED IN OPEN COUNTRY IN THE CENTRE OF THIS LARGE SCATTERED PARISH.IT IS STILL OUTSIDE THE AREA DESIGNATED FOR HOUSING.DURING{WORLD WAR 2 A KITCHEN {AND AIR RAID SHELTERS}WERE ERECTED . ONE IS USED AS A P.E.STORE TODAY.IN THE{LATE SIXTIES}2 NEW ESTATES WERE BUILT IN FIVE OAK GREEN DOUBLING THE SCHOOL ROLL.{IN 197O AN IMAGINATIVE {EXTENSION WAS OPENED}RETAINING THE VICTORIAN FRONT AND LINKING IT WITH A HALL,4 CLASSROOMS & MODERN KITCHEN.THE SCHOOL HOUSE BECAME THE OFFICE BLOCK. {IN 1981 A LIBRARY WAS DESIGNED AND {DONATED BY THE PARENTS ASSOCIATION.
